summary: "Speak Now" is Taylor Swift's third album, released in 2010. She wrote all the songs herself about growing up and relationships, including heartbreaks and facing critics. The album combines country pop and rock sounds. It was a big success, reaching number one in many countries and getting many awards. Swift even re-recorded it in 2023 after a dispute over her music rights. The album shows her growth as a songwriter and performer.
title: Speak Now
